hotels.title: Contemporary Bengkulu Mercure Escape near Panjang Beach with Onsite Restaurant, Day Spa & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the cultural aura of Indonesia with a stay at the elegant Mercure Bengkulu, tucked away on the southwest coast of Sumatra. With the picturesque Panjang Beach and star-shaped Fort Marlborough both within easy reach, this hotel is the ideal base for exploring Bengkulu's vibrant heritage. Spend your days lounging by the outdoor pool, soaking up the tropical sunshine, or indulging in rejuvenating treatments at the onsite spa. When hunger strikes, indulge in authentic Sumatran cuisine at PALM restaurant, snack on small plates at ANDUN or enjoy a tipple at the ultra-trendy Black Rock Bengkulu.
